verses.verse: <S%G5043>Children,<s%> <S%G5219>obey<s%> your <S%G1118>parents<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> is <S%G1342>right.<s%>
<S%G5091>Honor<s%> your <S%G3962>father<s%> and <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G3748>(which<s%> is the <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%> with a <S%G1860>promise<s%>),
that it may be <S%G2095>well<s%> with you, and that you may <S%G3118>live<s%> <S%G3118>long<s%> on the <S%G1093>earth.<s%>

And, <S%G3962>fathers,<s%> do not <S%G3949>provoke<s%> your <S%G5043>children<s%> to <S%G3949>anger;<s%> but <S%G1625>bring<s%> them up in the <S%G3809>discipline<s%> and <S%G3559>instruction<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord.<s%>

<S%G1401>Slaves,<s%> be <S%G5219>obedient<s%> to <S%G3588>those<s%> who are your <S%G2962>masters<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> with <S%G5401>fear<s%> and <S%G5156>trembling,<s%> in the <S%G572>sincerity<s%> of your <S%G2588>heart,<s%> as to <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

not by <S%G2596>way<s%> of <S%G3787>eyeservice,<s%> as men-pleasers, but as <S%G1401>slaves<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G4160>doing<s%> the <S%G2307>will<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> from the <S%G5590>heart.<s%>
With <S%G2133>good<s%> <S%G2133>will<s%> <S%G1398>render<s%> <S%G1398>service,<s%> as to the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and not to <S%G444>men,<s%>

<S%G3609>knowing<s%> that <S%G1437>whatever<s%> <S%G5100><s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G18>thing<s%> <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1538>one<s%> <S%G4160>does,<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> he will <S%G2865>receive<s%> <S%G2865>back<s%> from the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> <S%G1535>whether<s%> <S%G1401>slave<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G1658>free.<s%>

And, <S%G2962>masters,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%> <S%G846>things<s%> to them, and <S%G447>give<s%> up <S%G547>threatening,<s%> <S%G3609>knowing<s%> that <S%G2532>both<s%> their <S%G2962>Master<s%> and <S%G4771>yours<s%> is in <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> and there is <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4382>partiality<s%> with Him.
<S%G3062>Finally,<s%> be <S%G1743>strong<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> and in the <S%G2904>strength<s%> of His <S%G2479>might.<s%>

<S%G1746>Put<s%> on the <S%G3833>full<s%> <S%G3833>armor<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G2476>firm<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G3180>schemes<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%>

For our <S%G3823>struggle<s%> is not <S%G4314>against<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> and <S%G129>blood,<s%> but <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G746>rulers,<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G1849>powers,<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G2888>world<s%> <S%G2888>forces<s%> of <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> the <S%G4152>spiritual<s%> [forces] of <S%G4189>wickedness<s%> in the <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> [places.]

<S%G1223>Therefore,<s%> <S%G3778><s%> <S%G353>take<s%> up the <S%G3833>full<s%> <S%G3833>armor<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> that you may be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G436>resist<s%> in the <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and having <S%G2716>done<s%> <S%G537>everything,<s%> to <S%G2476>stand<s%> <S%G2476>firm.<s%>

<S%G2476>Stand<s%> <S%G2476>firm<s%> <S%G3767>therefore,<s%> having <S%G4024>girded<s%> your <S%G3751>loins<s%> with <S%G225>truth,<s%> and having <S%G1746>put<s%> on the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G1343>righteousness,<s%>
and having <S%G5265>shod<s%> your <S%G4228>feet<s%> with the <S%G2091>preparation<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G1515>peace;<s%>

in addition to <S%G3956>all,<s%> <S%G353>taking<s%> up the <S%G2375>shield<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> with <S%G3739>which<s%> you will be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4570>extinguish<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4448>flaming<s%> <S%G956>missiles<s%> of the <S%G4190>evil<s%> [one.]
And <S%G1209>take<s%> the <S%G4030>helmet<s%> of <S%G4992>salvation,<s%> and the <S%G3162>sword<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is the <S%G4487>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

With <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4335>prayer<s%> and <S%G1162>petition<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> at <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G2540>times<s%> in the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> and with <S%G846>this<s%> in <S%G1519>view,<s%> be on the <S%G69>alert<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4343>perseverance<s%> and <S%G1162>petition<s%> for <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G40>saints,<s%>

and [pray] on my <S%G5228>behalf,<s%> that <S%G3056>utterance<s%> may be <S%G1325>given<s%> to me in the <S%G457>opening<s%> of my <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> to <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> with <S%G3954>boldness<s%> the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of the <S%G2098>gospel,<s%>

for <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G4243>am<s%> an <S%G4243>ambassador<s%> in <S%G254>chains;<s%> that in [proclaiming] it I may <S%G3955>speak<s%> <S%G3955>boldly,<s%> as I <S%G1163>ought<s%> to <S%G2980>speak.<s%>

But that you <S%G2532>also<s%> may <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G2596>about<s%> my <S%G3588>circumstances,<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> I am <S%G4238>doing,<s%> <S%G5190>Tychicus,<s%> the <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brother<s%> and <S%G4103>faithful<s%> <S%G1249>minister<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord,<s%> will <S%G1107>make<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to you.

And I have <S%G3992>sent<s%> him to you for <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G846>very<s%> purpose, <S%G2443>so<s%> that you may <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> us, and that he may <S%G3870>comfort<s%> your <S%G2588>hearts.<s%>

<S%G1515>Peace<s%> be to the <S%G80>brethren,<s%> and <S%G26>love<s%> with <S%G4102>faith,<s%> from <S%G2316>God<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> and the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G5485>Grace<s%> be with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G25>love<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> with [a love] <S%G861>incorruptible.<s%>
